phrases: Spun along with the runner's sash
Spun along with the runner's sash are numerous dramas.
This is the moment a new legend was born during the second section.
As temperatures rose during the fourth section, there was an accident.
A coach's words saved a runner.
On the steep slopes of Mt. Hakone...
My heart naturally begins to leap.
On January 2nd and 3rd of next year, we will be there this time.
Each of us will stand on his own starting line and wait for the sash.
We will receive it and pass it on to the next man.
Passing it on again and again, we will eventually meet again at Otemachi.
It will be the Kansei University Long Distance Track Team's first major accomplishment.
No, it will be the first time in recent history
that a team makes it to the Ekiden on their first try.
Do you guys feel a little closer now...
You can never watch this too many times!
Do not talk to me about New Year's!
On January 2nd and 3rd of next year, we will be there this time.
Each of us will stand on his own starting line and wait for
I am hoping to run in the Hakone Ekiden.
He is like a fish in water.
But we are in the mountains.
That is our 30th fan club application.
We have been getting more since we put up the website.
It is because the website you made is so good.
It is because the photos you take are so good.
We cannot keep up with him on the flats.
There is no way that is true.
I tried selling them to a general store, and look.
Super Popular <3 For Good Luck Nico Nico Dolls
You know it is nico for nicotine, right?
It does not matter what they are called.
Do you think you could increase production?
It is not like I ever put much thought into them.
I will mention them on our website.
we need to match everyone is strengths to each 20-kilometer section, right?
A team like ours has no choice but to focus on that.
I am planning to switch over to running in 10K races, too.
We need to increase our distance, starting with those who have achieved the requisite time.
I have been reading a few books on long distance running.
We are going to start lighting them.
I would like to understand the goals of our training schedule better.
Yuki understands the scientific stuff better than I do.
That is why I made him a member.
Do not you feel like practice is fun?
I guess it is because we went through that hellish Lake Shirakaba experience.
We are really running, are not we?
Maybe we will run right past Hakone all the way to Mt. Fuji.
There is nothing everyone else can do that you cannot do.
That is practically a full marathon!
I want to go back to Tokyo!
You will be strong enough to run back in another week.
Do not give me that bullshit.
We will be dumping plenty of water on you.
Promise me you will let me onto the truck before I die.
You need to keep future stars in your debt.
You must be getting good practice.
Everyone will achieve an official record.
We will participate in and naturally make it through the qualifier.
Our only goal is the peak of Hakone.
The actual race involves running back down, though.
We are still on the way there.
Look at how hard they are working.
Do not you want them to make it, no matter what?
But there are plenty of other guys out there
who are working just as hard.
It is kind of frustrating that all we can do is watch.
That is why I said damn.
Dad, I want to go to Kansei University.
Want to head up to the summit before we return to Tokyo?
You want to do more training?
Let us see the view together to cap off this training camp.
I thought views were something I would enjoy once I was old.
But it is kind of nice.
Have we gotten used to the outdoors?
It is because we are viewing it together.
I doubt we would feel this way if we viewed it alone.
What feeling are you talking about?
You are starting to say some pretty witty things.
Did not he say he wanted to become a better speaker
when we were drinking the other day?
What is wrong with you guys?
We are friends running the same path together.
See you at the finish line.
All runners participating in the 5000-meter race, please gather at the starting line.
All runners participating in the 5000-meter race, please gather at the starting line.
We will block the wind for you.
It is not about the order in which you finish.
It is a race against time.
Have you always been a runner?
You have got plenty more chances!
His times are definitely improving, though.
I am just going for a short run.
Are not you taking a bath?
You are a freak, are not you?
It is just a short jog.
It is something I do occasionally.
Does not sitting in the water in the dark make you feel incredibly uneasy?
Doing it deliberately makes me feel like I can reexamine myself.
Should I have gone with him?
Leaving a person alone can be kindness as well.
Even if he runs alone, he is not alone.
He told me that a while ago.
That no matter how much you run alone, you are not actually alone.
Running is fun, is not it?
It is just running, but I have learned all kinds of things.
Since you are always in the front, you probably have not noticed,
but recently I made a wonderful discovery.
Oh, how wonderful it is to be young.
It is dark, and we are naked.
I thought it was a streetlight, but it is the moon.
I caught it in my hands.
What is going on with you?
Um, do you have a moment?
You really are interested in them.
They might not even make it to the qualifier, though.
You are not going to stand with him?
You do not want to pressure him?
He will feel it no matter where I am.
How much time do you think we have spent together?
I am jealous of them that they have you to say that.
Um, do you have a moment?
If there is something you want to say,
When they look at me like that...
Now we all have official records!
We made it to the qualifier!
